q.quote: Fashion fades, only style remains the same.
q.author: Coco Chanel

q.quote: I would want my legacy to be that I was a great son, father and friend.
q.author: Dante Hall

q.quote: I like nonsense; it wakes up the brain cells.
q.author: Coco Chanel

q.quote: Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue.
q.author: Plato

q.quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
q.author: Virat Kohli

q.quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
q.author: Richard Bach

q.quote: Sorrow can be alleviated by good sleep, a bath and a glass of wine.
q.author: Thomas Aquinas

q.quote: Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue.
q.author: Plato

q.quote: Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God; trust also in me.
q.author: Jesus Christ

q.quote: Love the giver more than the gift.
q.author: Plato

q.quote: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.
q.author: Chris Rock

q.quote: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being with an independent will.
q.author: Chris Rock

q.quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
q.author: Plato

q.quote: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.
q.author: Chris Rock

q.quote: Choose a wife rather by your ear than your eye.
q.author: Thomas Fuller
